about_the_game:
The time has come. The painting of "La Gioconda" will be exhibited in the city museum for 3 days. It's the time you have to plan the robbery.

Put yourself in the shoes of Moriarty and plan the robbery in the best possible way. Every decision you make during the game will affect the outcome of the mission, so plan and organize, evaluate all the options, determine the right moment to perpetrate the heist and manage to emerge victorious from the mission.

During these 3 days you will be able to talk with other citizens who will help you better understand the rhythms of the city.
Remember: Do not arouse suspicion, be cautious, talk to others and avoid being seen at the most crucial moments. Do you think you can do it?

This game has been created entirely by Daniel "Dana" Puchau, founder and sole member of Impure Games, with a multitude of adventure games under his belt, creator of the 'The Shapeshifter' trilogy for the Game Boy, winner of numerous awards (best homebrew game 2021). The art, design, music, animations, programming and editing has been created entirely by Dana.
